text: Michael McCarty (September 7, 1946 - September 26, 2014) was an American movie, television, and stage actor. He was known for his roles in Casper (1995), Dead Man (1995), and in The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000). He was born in Evansville, Indiana. McCarty died in Santa Barbara, California from heart failure after traveling there for a stage production. He was 68 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Indiana Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from heart failure
title: Michael McCarty
